keyword: how many calories in white wine
title: How Many Calories in White Wine?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in white wine per standard glass, including carbs, alcohol content, and variations for dry vs. sweet types.
h1: How Many Calories in White Wine?
assumptions: Dry white wine, 12% ABV, standard 150 ml (5 oz) serving; no added sugars or mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (dry/sweet), brand, alcohol percentage, and serving size. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 150 ml glass of dry white wine contains about 123 calories, mostly from alcohol and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a glass of white wine?
faqs.a: About 123 kcal in a 150 ml glass of dry white wine.
Yes, around 3.9 g carbs per 150 ml glass, mainly from sugars.

faqs.q: How do calories in white wine compare to red wine?
faqs.a: Similar; dry white and red both ~120-130 kcal per glass, varying by sweetness.

faqs.q: Are there calories from alcohol in white wine?
faqs.a: Yes, alcohol contributes ~7 kcal per gram; most calories in wine come from ethanol.

faqs.q: What affects calories in white wine?
faqs.a: Alcohol content, sweetness level, and serving size; dry wines are lower in calories.
